name: Bob The Cube
description: Bob The Cube is a 3D platformer game. Bob The Cube is the main character of the game. Bob's girlfriend was kidnapped and you have to complete all the levels to rescue her. You have to go through 15 unique 3D and 2.5D levels in 5 different worlds.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIndows 7 or Later 64bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: yes
recommended_requirements: OS: WIndows 7 or Later 64bit Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: yes
